pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy Installation of the 'ped suite' Packages for Pedigree Analysis // The 'ped suite' is a collection of packages for pedigree analysis, covering applications in forensic genetics, medical genetics and more. A detailed presentation of the 'ped suite' is given in the book 'Pedigree Analysis in R' (Vigeland, 2021, ISBN: 9780128244302).
